original: 「自董卓伊始，盪覆京畿，後有曹操，竊執天衡，悖亂天下。」「臣等以備肺腑枝葉，宗子籓翰，心存國家，念在弭亂。」
text: "From the beginning of Dong Zhuoyi, the capital was overthrown, followed by Cao Cao, who robbed Tian Heng and went against the world." "The ministers waited to prepare for the branches and leaves. Zongzi Lunhan, who has the country in his heart, is thinking about the chaos.
